This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $99 for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your life with our top-tier product! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $99. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $99
(2) Reject Alice's offer
